actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A resolution expressing a sense of the Senate with respect to recent events in Los Angeles and regarding an urban renewal policy.

summary.text: States that the Senate must quickly act to bring about: (1) reform of social programs toward rewarding the working poor; (2) creation of a tax code that provides incentives to the poor disadvantaged to work, save, and invest and to keep families together; (3) expansion of homeownership opportunities; (4) reduction of taxes on the working poor; (5) elimination of the capital gains tax for investments in inner cities; and (6) creation of more educational choice.

titles.title: A resolution expressing a sense of the Senate with respect to recent events in Los Angeles and regarding an urban renewal policy.
